cpbc_no_consumption_data: No usage for the selected period.
cpbc_monthly_instance_col_total_tooltip: Billed at the beginning of the month.
cpbc_hourly_instance_col_consumption_too: Billed at the beginning of the following month.
cpbc_hourly_instance_monthly_billing_sin: The instance was switched to monthly billing on {{since}}
cpbc_hourly_instance_pass_to_monthly_err: Oops, we could not add this instance to monthly billing.
cpbc_hourly_instance_pass_to_monthly_pri: Oops. We were unable to retrieve the amount for the monthly fixed rate.
cpbc_hourly_instance_pass_to_monthly_inf: You will be charged right away, on a pro-rata basis, for the days remaining in the current month.
cpbc_hourly_instance_pass_to_monthly: Switch the instance to monthly billing
cpbc_object_storage_consumption_info_par: You get billed based on the actual storage space, calculated each hour, down to the nearest hour.
cpbc_archive_storage_consumption_info_pa: You get billed based on the actual storage space, calculated each hour, down to the nearest hour.
cpbc_object_storage_output_traffic_info_: Every outgoing gigabyte is billed (whatever the destination)
cpbc_archive_storage_output_traffic_info: Every outgoing gigabyte is billed (whatever the destination)
cpbc_archive_storage_input_traffic_info_: Every incoming gigabyte is billed (whatever the destination)
cpbc_object_storage_output_traffic_info_: . You have used {{amount}} GiB during this period. Incoming traffic is never charged.
cpbc_archive_storage_output_traffic_info: . You have used {{amount}} GiB during this period.
cpbc_archive_storage_input_traffic_info_: . You have used {{amount}} GiB during this period.
cpbc_snapshot_col_usage_tooltip: Billed at the beginning of the following month.
cpbc_snapshot_col_usage_info_part1: You get billed based on the actual storage space, calculated each hour, down to the nearest hour.
cpbc_volume_col_consumption_tooltip: Billed at the beginning of the following month.
cpbc_volume_consumption_tooltip_part1: You get billed based on the actual storage space, calculated each hour, down to the nearest hour.
